adMarkers.description: The ad marker type for this output group.

authenticationScheme.description: Authentication scheme to use when connecting with CDN.

cacheFullBehavior.description: Controls behavior when content cache fills up.

cacheLength.description: Cache length in seconds, is used to calculate buffer size.

captionData.description: Controls the types of data that passes to onCaptionInfo outputs.

inputLossAction.description: Controls the behavior of the RTMP group if input becomes unavailable.

restartDelay.description: Number of seconds to wait until a restart is initiated.
